entity1.name: Astronaut
entity1.description: A person trained to travel in a spacecraft and work in space.
entity1.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut1

entity2.name: Space Exploration
entity2.description: The discovery and exploration of outer space, including the study of celestial bodies and phenomena that originate outside Earth's atmosphere.
entity2.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut1

entity3.name: Universe
entity3.description: All of space and time and their contents, including planets, stars, galaxies, and all other forms of matter and energy.
entity3.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut1

entity11.description: A regular meeting held in the morning to discuss daily activities and updates.

entity15.name: astronauts
entity15.description: Individuals trained to travel and work in space.

entity17.name: astronauts
entity17.description: Individuals trained to travel and work in space, often conducting scientific research or maintenance tasks on spacecraft.

entity18.name: scientific research
entity18.description: Systematic investigation into and study of materials, structures, organisms, or phenomena to discover facts or principles.
entity18.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut10

entity19.name: station's systems or equipment
entity19.description: The various mechanical, electrical, and life support systems that are part of a space station, essential for its operation and the safety of its crew.

entity20.name: astronaut
entity20.description: A person trained to travel in a spacecraft.

entity21.name: exercise
entity21.description: Physical activity performed to maintain or improve health and fitness.
entity21.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut11

entity22.name: microgravity
entity22.description: A condition of very low gravity, such as that experienced in space.
entity22.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut12

entity23.name: human body
entity23.description: The physical structure and function of a human being.
entity23.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut12

entity24.name: astronauts

entity24.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut12

entity25.name: Astronauts
entity25.description: Professionals trained to travel and perform tasks in space.
entity25.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut13

entity26.name: treadmills
entity26.description: Exercise machines used for walking or running while staying in one place.
entity26.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut13

entity27.name: resistance machines
entity27.description: Exercise equipment designed to provide resistance against muscle movement, often used for strength training.

entity28.name: astronauts
entity28.description: Individuals trained to travel and work in space, often responsible for conducting scientific experiments and maintaining spacecraft.
entity28.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut14

entity29.name: living quarters
entity29.description: The area within a spacecraft or space station where crew members reside and perform daily activities.

entity30.name: station's systems
entity30.description: The various operational components of a space station, including life support, power generation, and communication systems.

entity31.name: crew
entity31.description: The group of individuals working and living on the space station.

entity32.name: space station
entity32.description: A large spacecraft designed for long-term human habitation in orbit around Earth or other celestial bodies.

entity33.name: astronauts

entity35.name: Earth
entity35.description: The third planet from the Sun, where humans live and which is often visible to astronauts as a viewable object from space.

entity36.name: downtime
entity36.description: Periods of rest or inactivity, especially during work or missions.
entity36.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut17

entity37.name: morale
entity37.description: The mental and emotional condition (of a person) with regard to confidence, hopefulness, and enthusiasm.
entity37.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut17

entity38.name: mental well-being
entity38.description: A state of psychological and emotional health characterized by good mental functioning and positive feelings.
entity38.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut17

entity39.name: long-duration space missions
entity39.description: Extended periods spent in outer space, typically involving astronauts or cosmonauts on spacecraft for prolonged durations.
